```{r}
data <- read.csv("Crash.csv")

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tigris)

```

## Visualization 1

```{r}
data %>%
  group_by(Collision.Type) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  filter(count > 10000) %>%
  filter(Collision.Type != "OTHER") %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_col(mapping = aes(y = count, x = Collision.Type, color = Collision.Type)) + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank()) + 
  labs(
    x = "Collision Type",
    y = "Total Collisions"
  ) 
```
